## FieldTextInput.bindInputEvents\_() method

Bind handlers for user input on the text input field's editor.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected bindInputEvents_(htmlInput: HTMLElement): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  htmlInput | HTMLElement | The htmlInput to which event handlers will be bound. |
